Text.Language: In the blessed city of Thebes, / In Egyptâ€™s southern region, / Saint Maurice was commander / Of the Theban Legion.

â€œWe will not worship idols, / Nor resist dying for Him, / We would rather die innocent, / Than live in shame and sin.â€?
